short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Laps let's you track how much time you are spending on websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are currently in beta.

Features
🏁 Total browsing time for all sites
🏁 Total browsing time for individual sites
🏁 Ability to view total time spent for different periods (1D, 1W, 1M, 3M, 1Y, ALL)
🏁 Ability to see total time spent at any point in time.

For help:  
🏁 https://medium.com/@laps_app
🏁 https://twitter.com/Laps_app
🏁 https://laps.gg/discord
